GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This file contains the metadata, events, and data for REDCap project "Template-2 Atrium-Mintoo".

redcap:DataQualityRules.rule_name: Date of Baseline Medical assessment should be within 28 days before Treatment Day 1 of cycle 1
Treatment should start within 28 days of informed consent
Cycle 1 Day 1 of treatment cannot be before Informed consent date or Registration date
Day 3 of treatment cycle should be two days after Day 1 of the cycle
Day 8 of treatment cycle should be seven days after Day 1 of the cycle
Day 10 of treatment cycle should be nine days after Day 1 of the cycle
Day 15 of treatment cycle should be fourteen days after Day 1 of the cycle
Day 17 of treatment cycle should be sixteen days after Day 1 of the cycle
Day 24 of treatment cycle should be twenty three days after Day 1 of the cycle
The new cycle start date should not be less than 28 days after the previous cycle start date
The new cycle start date should not be more than 28 days after the previous cycle start date
Cycle 1 Day 1 Lab assessment date for the Cycle 1 Day 1 should either be same as the visit date or within 72 hrs before treatment start date
redcap:DataQualityRules.rule_logic: (([day_1_arm_1][vf_cycle][current-instance] = 1) and ([day_1_arm_1][vf_day][current-instance]= 'Day 1') and (datediff([day_1_arm_1][lab_blooddate], [day_1_arm_1][vf_azdtime][current-instance], 'h', true) > 72)) or (([day_1_arm_1][vf_cycle][current-instance] = 1) and ([day_1_arm_1][vf_day][current-instance]= 'Day 1') and (datediff([day_1_arm_1][lab_blooddate], [day_1_arm_1][vf_azdtime][current-instance], 'm', true) < 15))

The value does not equal the number of 20 mg tablets prescribed
Number of 80 mg tablets prescribed per day - The expected value is 1
The value does not equal the number of 80 mg tablets prescribed

Day 10 AZD6738 must be taken 30 mins (+/- 15) mins before Gemcitabine
Day 17 AZD6738 must be taken 30 mins (+/- 15) mins before Gemcitabine

All Day 3 research blood samples (except the peak PK sample) should be taken at least 5 min before AZD6738 and Gemcitabine administration.
All Day 8 research blood samples (except the peak PK sample) should be taken at least 5 min before AZD6738
All Day 10 research blood samples (except the peak PK sample) should be taken at least 5 min before AZD6738 and Gemcitabine administration.
All Day 17 research blood samples (except the peak PK sample) should be taken at least 5 min before AZD6738 and Gemcitabine administration.
Core Tissue Biopsy - The Screening core tissue biopsy date should not be after the date of registration
Day 1 PK samples are required on *Cycle 1 Day 1* only

Day 24 - PK samples are required on *Cycle 1 Day 24* only

redcap:DataQualityRules.rule_name: AZD6738 Dose Adherence - The start date of interruption should not be after the next cycle start date
redcap:DataQualityRules.rule_logic: ([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_cycle][current-instance] = [day_1_arm_1][vf_cycle][current-instance]) and ((([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat1][current-instance] != '') and (datediff([day_1_arm_1][vf_date][next-instance],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat1][current-instance],"d",true) > 0)) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat2][current-instance] != '') and (datediff([day_1_arm_1][vf_date][next-instance],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat2][current-instance],"d",true) > 0)) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat3][current-instance] != '') and (datediff([day_1_arm_1][vf_date][next-instance],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat3][current-instance],"d",true) > 0)) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat4][current-instance] != '') and (datediff([day_1_arm_1][vf_date][next-instance],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat4][current-instance],"d",true) > 0)) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat5][current-instance] != '') and (datediff([day_1_arm_1][vf_date][next-instance],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat5][current-instance],"d",true) > 0))) and ([event-label] = 'Treatment Diary')

redcap:DataQualityRules.rule_name: AZD6738 Dose Adherence - The start date of new episode of dose interruption should not be on or before the resume date of previous dose interruption
redcap:DataQualityRules.rule_logic: (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat2] != '') and datediff([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat2],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat1],'d', true) >= 0) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat3] != '') and datediff([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat3],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat2],'d', true) >= 0) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat4] != '') and datediff([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat4],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat3],'d', true) >= 0) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat5] != '') and datediff([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat5],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat4],'d', true) >= 0)

redcap:DataQualityRules.rule_name: AZD6738 Dose Adherence - The date of resuming the dose should not be on or before the start date of dose interruption
redcap:DataQualityRules.rule_logic: (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat1] != '') and datediff([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat1],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat1],'d', true) <= 0) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat2] != '') and datediff([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat2],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat2],'d', true) <= 0) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat3] != '') and datediff([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat3],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat3],'d', true) <= 0) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat4] != '') and datediff([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat4],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat4],'d', true) <= 0) or (([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat5] != '') and datediff([treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_startdat5],[treatment_diary_arm_1][adher_resdat5],'d', true) <= 0)
